Soh Sing Heng, Financial Blogger at SG Young InvestmentLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 09 Sep 2018I first got interested through a book titled rich dad poor dad. This book inspired me to save up and buy assets (which is investing) that puts money in my pocket. Thereafter, I begin reading more books to learn.
